name: Ultima VIII: Pagan
description:
Ultima VIII: Pagan is a RPG game developed by Origin Systems. It was originally released in 1994. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Ultima VIII: Pagan on PC.
It was produced by Dallas Snell, John Watson and Richard Garriott. It was directed by Mike McShaffry. It was scored by Herman Miller, John Tipton, Kirk Winterrowd and Nenad Vugrinec.
